Project Title: Wildfire
Version: Release v1.0.1, December 7, 2021
Author: Eric Weng

HOW TO RUN: Open "launch.sh" with your operating system's command line program (Terminal or Command Prompt) to run the application
System Requirements: Java JRE 11 (recommended) or 8
Download: https://adoptium.net/ (Select version and click "Latest Release")
